name: Rolling Ball Sky Escape
description:
A road full of unexpected obstacles lies ahead in this challenging rolling ball platformer!

Let’s prepare yourself to feel happy and relaxed by playing going balls. Roll, spin, jump and don’t lose lives because unexpected obstacles lie ahead. Get ready & participate in an epic ball race in a different environment. You will have a lot of fun in your spare time by playing ball run 2048.
Going Balls
Only focus and speed will help you unlock more levels with new challenges. Discover a way for going balls 3d with your fingers. Sky ball jump has different existing levels which are full of adventure. Prove bowling skills by making rolling balls cross all obstacles or reach safe & sound. You will face tons of traps and hurdles at each level in sky ball race.
Offline Games
Swipe on screen to jump the color ball quickly or balance it carefully. Keep Sky going balls 3d on tracks to jump over hurdles for an amazing ball race 3d. Main goal in this going ball run 2048 game is to pass through all levels by reaching the maximum score. Go to the landscape mode and enter into the world of offline going balls games.

Features:

• Easy, one-finger swipe ball control
• A funny collection of balls to play with
• Inventive and more treacherous tasks at every turn
• Remove Ads available
